title: Honey Wheat Challah
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '500ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '135g bread flour', '75ml vegetable oil', '5 tablespoons honey or more to taste', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons salt', '270g bread flour or more if needed', '360g wholemeal flour or more if needed', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon water', '4 tablespoons sesame seeds']
